00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <math.h>
00020 
00021 static double* JulianDateSplit(
00022   double inputJD[2],
00023   double outputJD[2] )
00024 {
00025     double remainder;
00026     double temp; 
00027     
00028     outputJD[0] = inputJD[0];
00029     outputJD[1] = inputJD[1];
00030 
00031     /* the Julian date must be of the form:
00032        outputJD[0] = (Julian Day #) + 0.5
00033        outputJD[1] = Julian Day fraction (0 <= outputJD[1] < 1) */
00034 
00035     /* Make sure outputJD[0] is greater in magnitude than outputJD[1] */
00036 
00037     if (fabs(outputJD[1]) > fabs(outputJD[0]))
00038     {
00039       temp = outputJD[0];
00040       outputJD[0] = outputJD[1];
00041       outputJD[1] = temp;
00042     }
00043 
00044     /* Make sure outputJD[0] is half integral */
00045 
00046     if ((remainder=fmod(outputJD[0],1.0)) != 0.5)
00047     {
00048       outputJD[0] = outputJD[0] - remainder + 0.5;
00049       outputJD[1] = outputJD[1] + remainder - 0.5;
00050     }
00051 
00052     /* Make sure magnitude of outputJD[1] is less than 1.0 */
00053     if (fabs(outputJD[1]) >= 1.0)
00054     {
00055       remainder=fmod(outputJD[1],1.0);
00056       outputJD[0] += outputJD[1] - remainder;
00057       outputJD[1] = remainder;
00058     }
00059 
00060     /* Make sure outputJD[1] is greater than or equal to 0.0 */
00061 
00062     if (outputJD[1] < 0)
00063     {
00064       if ((outputJD[1] + 1.0) < 1.0)
00065       {
00066         outputJD[0] -= 1.0;
00067         outputJD[1] += 1.0;
00068       }
00069       else
00070         outputJD[1] = 0.0;
00071     }
00072 
00073     return outputJD;
00074 }
00075 
00076 static void calday(                 /* converts Julian day to calendar components */
00077   int julianDayNum, /* Julian day */
00078   int *year,        /* calendar year */
00079   int *month,       /* calendar month */
00080   int *day)         /* calendar day (of month) */
00081 { 
00082     long         l;            /* intermediate variable */
00083     long         n;            /* intermediate variable */
00084 
00085     l = julianDayNum + 68569; 
00086     n = 4 * l / 146097; 
00087     l = l - (146097 * n + 3) / 4;  
00088     *year = (int)(4000 * (l + 1) / 1461001); 
00089     l = l - 1461 * (*year) / 4 + 31; 
00090     *month = (int)(80 * l / 2447L); 
00091     *day = (int)(l - 2447 * (*month) / 80);  
00092     l = *month / 11;  
00093     *month = (int)(*month + 2 - 12 * l);  
00094     *year = (int)(100 * (n - 49) + *year + l);
00095      
00096     return;  
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00112 MTKt_status MtkUtcJdToUtc(
00113   double jdUTCin[2], 
00114   char utc_datetime[MTKd_DATETIME_LEN]  )
00115 {
00116   double  jdUTC[2];
00117   int year;             /* year portion of date */
00118   int month;            /* month portion of date */
00119   int day;              /* day portion of date */
00120   int          hours;           /* hour of day */
00121   int          minutes;         /* minute of hour */
00122   double  seconds;         /* seconds of minute */
00123   int          intSecs;   /* integer number of UTC seconds of latest minute */
00124   int          fracSecs;  /* integer number of microseconds of latest second */
00125   double  dayFractionSecs;
00126     
00127   JulianDateSplit(jdUTCin,jdUTC);
00128 
00129   calday((int)(jdUTC[0] + 0.5), &year, &month, &day);
00130 
00131   dayFractionSecs = jdUTC[1] * SECONDSperDAY + 5.0e-7;
00132 
00133   hours = (int) (dayFractionSecs / 3600.0);
00134   minutes = (int) ((dayFractionSecs - hours * 3600.0) / 60.0);
00135   seconds = (dayFractionSecs - hours * 3600.0 - minutes * 60.0);
00136   intSecs = (int) seconds;
00137   fracSecs = (int) (fmod(dayFractionSecs,1.0) * 1.0e6);
00138     
00139     /* sometimes jdUTC[1] is right on the edge and is just shy of 1 when it
00140        should be 1 and "tip over" into the next day */
00141 
00142   if (hours == 24)
00143   {
00144     hours = 0;
00145     calday((int)(jdUTC[0] + 1.5), &year, &month, &day);
00146   }
00147     
00148   sprintf(utc_datetime,"%04d-%02d-%02dT%02d:%02d:%02d.%06dZ", (int)year, 
00149           (int)month, (int)day, hours, minutes, intSecs, fracSecs);
00150         
00151   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00152 }
